channel.title: [REAL #474] Volltex #474 - Everything we loved just got better!
channel.description:
THIS IS ALL I've Gotten done so far :)
[CENTER][b]Hello and welcome to the Official Project Thread for Volltex #474 :) i do not plan on having any type of competition because im still kinda new to all this stuff :D[/b]
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/29kuy5y.png[/img]
uTube Channel - [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/user/VolltexHQ"]http://www.youtube.com/user/VolltexHQ[/URL]
This server is based on Revision #474 :)
[b]Quick Answers![/b] [code]Q.Why did you pick 474? A. Because it was my favorite time to play RS duh.. Q. Will you release this after you are done? A. I have not come up with a decision yet.. I will let you guys know. Q.Will you quite this Project? because u have like 2 more.. A. As i said i will only be working on this project. Because GTA was a good idea i will work on it in the future and as far as "Pixel-Scape" goes i don't see a bright future for it :D Q. Okay so then do you think you will post in tut's on 474's A. Ofc i will i want to see people using 474 i want them to rise :D Q. Are you only doing this so you can make a 474? or what? A. I am doing this because i saw a sudden Increase on 474 projects if you will[Aurora-474, No name #474, and world2:hurr: Q. Why even try Xaves 474 along with World 2, will be better then yours.... A. Tbh idgaff yes "idgaff"= [u]i dont give a flying fuck[/u] I will try my best and thats what counts right? :hurr: Q. Dude lmfao you just join R-S wtf? and this? A. That maybe the case but don't let me lets say 30 post fool you :hurr:
[b]SO NOW NO POSTING DUMB QUESTION MMKAY GOOD :lol:[/code][/b]
[b]The Current Programmers of Volltex #474:[/b] [b]Jacob[/b] You can Contact me here--> [email]Jacob4rd@hotmail.com[/email] don't message me to give you anything on 474 unless you give in return :)
Intro: Hey guys my name is jacob as most of you can see. :hurr: most of you don't know me no don't try and guess because this is my 1st account on R-S lol. This will be one of my projects that my pride and glory will be in :D I have a lot in store for you guys and i want this to be a very active thread also. What i have planned for this server will be awesome i plan on loading 508 maps 100% 508 character models[lets just say the cache :D] this will also not be an easy server. Let's say a PK server or a Eco server it will be a blen of both. I'm trying to go for a copy of [u]RuneScape[/u] back in the day but in my own unique way if you know what i mean :D. The leveling will not be easy but then it will not be as hard as [u]RuneScape[/u] i will make up my own economy or just use [u]RuneScape's[/u] I haven't made up my mind yet. I plan on making all the skills work to the level im able to get them, I also plan on Making a few quest if not alot :D i might use some of [u]RuneScape's[/u] also. Now i know people do not like server's where it is hard to level, Get $$, That's because its more then just a RSPS "even though it is ;D" i want this to become a big and popular MMORPG for every 1 to play. Now i know im asking for alot with my basic skills of Java but i think as i do it my Skills will grow along with my knowledge of Java that's pretty much it thanks for reading :D.
~Jacob
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Code] Green= DONE Orange= Working On Red= Not Started[/code]
Spoiler here for now just do code [code]Skills: ill get the them later cba to think lol [/code]
[/code] [code]
[ul][SIZE="6"][B]Combat[/B][/SIZE]
[*][SIZE="5"][B]PvP[/B][/SIZE]
[*][B][SIZE="4"]Melee[/SIZE][/B] [*][COLOR="Orange"]Specials[/COLOR] [*][COLOR="Orange"]Level Requirements[/COLOR] [*][COLOR="Orange"]Effects (barrows etc)[/COLOR] [*][COLOR="Orange"]Hit formula [*]Timing[/COLOR][/ul]
[ul][*][SIZE="4"][B]Ranged[/B][/SIZE]
[COLOR="DarkOrange"][*]Specials [*]Hit formula [*]Timing [*]Graphics [*]Level Requirements [*]Crossbows + special bolts[/COLOR][/ul]
[ul][*][SIZE="4"][B]Magic[/B][/SIZE]
[*][COLOR="DarkOrange"]Modern [*]Combat Spells[/COLOR] [*]Curses [*][COLOR="DarkOrange"]Ancient[/COLOR] [COLOR="rgb(255, 140, 0)"] [*]Combat Spells [*]Spell Effects [*]Teleports[/COLOR] [*][COLOR="DarkOrange"]Lunar[/COLOR] [*]Healing Spells [*][COLOR="lime"]Vengance (other)[/COLOR][/ul]
[ul][*][SIZE="5"][B]PvN[/B][/SIZE]
[*][SIZE="4"][B]Melee[/B][/SIZE]
[COLOR="Orange"] [*]Specials [*]Level Requirements [*]Effects (barrows etc) [*]Hit formula [*]Timing [/COLOR][/ul]
[ul][*][SIZE="4"][B]Ranged[/B][/SIZE]
[COLOR="DarkOrange"][*]Specials [*]Hit formula [*]Timing [*]Graphics [*]Level Requirements [*]Crossbows + special bolts[/COLOR][/ul]
[ul][*][SIZE="4"][B]Magic[/B][/SIZE]
[COLOR="DarkOrange"][*]Modern [*]Combat Spells[/COLOR] [*]Curses [COLOR="Orange"][*]Ancient[/COLOR] [COLOR="DarkOrange"][*]Combat Spells [*]Spell Effects[/COLOR] [COLOR="Orange"][*]Lunar[/COLOR] [*][COLOR="Lime"]Vengance[/COLOR][/ul] [/code]
[code][B][SIZE="5"]Skills[/SIZE][/B]
[B][SIZE="4"]Prayer[/SIZE][/B] Bone Burying Prayers Altars
[B][SIZE="4"]Magic[/SIZE][/B]
Teleporting Item Spells Charge
[B][SIZE="4"]Cooking[/SIZE][/B]
Bakery Drinks Fish
[B][SIZE="4"]Woodcutting[/SIZE][/B]
All trees Tree removal with stump when out of logs(with respawning) Stop other players when you cut the tree Level reqs, hatchet animation, correct messages
[B][SIZE="4"]Fletching[/SIZE][/B]
Arrows Bows Fishing Fish
[B][SIZE="4"]Firemaking[/SIZE][/B]
Logs Global Objects Clipping
[B][SIZE="4"]Crafting[/SIZE][/B]
Leather Pottery Dragonhide Gems + Jewlery
[*][B][SIZE="4"]Smithing[/SIZE][/B] Smelting Smithing
[B][SIZE="4"]Mining[/SIZE][/B]
All Rocks Correct messages, level reqs, pickaxe animation Stop others when you get the ore Random gem Rock replacing with Empty rock(with respawning)
[B][SIZE="4"]Herblore[/SIZE][/B]
Cleaning Potions Mixing Agility A lot to almost all Courses
[B][SIZE="4"]Thieving[/SIZE][/B]
Pickpocketing Stalls Easy costumizable rewards
[B][SIZE="4"]Slayer[/SIZE][/B]
Tasks NPC Requirements
[B][SIZE="4"]Farming[/SIZE][/B]
Flowers Herbs Fruit Trees
[*][B][SIZE="4"]Runecrafting[/SIZE][/B] Altars Talismins Multiple Runes
[B][SIZE="4"]Construction[/SIZE][/B]
Idk yet.
[B][SIZE="4"]Hunter[/SIZE][/B] [/code]
[SPOILER="Pics/Animations"] [SPOILER="GIF Animations"] MODERN [IMG]http://i1237.photobucket.com/albums/ff462/jacob4rd/Modern.gif[/IMG] ANCIENT [IMG]http://i1237.photobucket.com/albums/ff462/jacob4rd/Ancient.gif[/IMG] RANGE [IMG]http://i1237.photobucket.com/albums/ff462/jacob4rd/Range.gif[/IMG][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER="Pictures"] IN ORDER FROM OLD TO NEW [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/bh0pxd.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/71ryf8.png[/IMG] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2u6o6de.png[/IMG] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2whkx8j.png[/IMG] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/34j38nt.png[/IMG] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/27zxgdj.png[/IMG] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/dws381.png[/IMG] Done :hurr: [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/29cosrb.png[/IMG] Done :hurr: [/SPOILER]

item.title: [REAL #474] Volltex #474 - Everything we loved just got better!
item.dc:creator: @jacob4rd jacob4rd
item.description:
@jacob4rd wrote:

THIS IS ALL I’ve Gotten done so far

[CENTER]Hello and welcome to the Official Project Thread for Volltex #474 i do not plan on having any type of competition because im still kinda new to all this stuff

uTube Channel - http://www.youtube.com/user/VolltexHQ

This server is based on Revision #474

Quick Answers!

[code]Q.Why did you pick 474?
A. Because it was my favorite time to play RS duh…
Q. Will you release this after you are done?
A. I have not come up with a decision yet… I will let you guys know.
Q.Will you quite this Project? because u have like 2 more…
A. As i said i will only be working on this project. Because GTA was a good idea i will work on it in the future
and as far as “Pixel-Scape” goes i don’t see a bright future for it
Q. Okay so then do you think you will post in tut’s on 474’s
A. Ofc i will i want to see people using 474 i want them to rise
Q. Are you only doing this so you can make a 474? or what?
A. I am doing this because i saw a sudden Increase on 474 projects if you will[Aurora-474, No name #474, and world2:hurr:
Q. Why even try Xaves 474 along with World 2, will be better then yours…
A. Tbh idgaff yes “idgaff”= i dont give a flying fuck I will try my best and thats what counts right? :hurr:
Q. Dude lmfao you just join R-S wtf? and this?
A. That maybe the case but don’t let me lets say 30 post fool you :hurr:

SO NOW NO POSTING DUMB QUESTION MMKAY GOOD :lol:[/code]

The Current Programmers of Volltex #474:
Jacob
You can Contact me here–> Jacob4rd@hotmail.com don’t message me to give you anything on 474 unless you give in return

Intro:
Hey guys my name is jacob as most of you can see. :hurr: most of you don’t know me no don’t try and guess because this is my 1st account on R-S lol.
This will be one of my projects that my pride and glory will be in I have a lot in store for you guys and i want this to be a very active thread also.
What i have planned for this server will be awesome i plan on loading 508 maps 100% 508 character models[lets just say the cache :D] this will also not be an easy server.
Let’s say a PK server or a Eco server it will be a blen of both. I’m trying to go for a copy of RuneScape back in the day but in my own unique way if you know what i mean :D.
The leveling will not be easy but then it will not be as hard as RuneScape i will make up my own economy or just use RuneScape’s I haven’t made up my mind yet.
I plan on making all the skills work to the level im able to get them, I also plan on Making a few quest if not alot i might use some of RuneScape’s also.
Now i know people do not like server’s where it is hard to level, Get $$, That’s because its more then just a RSPS “even though it is ;D” i want this to become a big and popular MMORPG for every 1 to play.
Now i know im asking for alot with my basic skills of Java but i think as i do it my Skills will grow along with my knowledge of Java that’s pretty much it thanks for reading :D.

~Jacob

Green= DONE
Orange= Working On
Red= Not Started[/code]
